mapper.insert: insert into book(name, description, publish_date, author, publisher, category,book_no,cover,score,nums) values (#{name},#{description},#{publishDate},#{author}, #{publisher},#{category},#{bookNo},#{cover},#{score},#{nums})
mapper.update: update book set nums = nums + 1 where book_no = #{bookNo}
mapper.select:
select * from book
name like concat('%',#{ name },'%')
and book_no like concat('%',#{ bookNo },'%')
order by id desc
